title: Creation of User Manual for M2M Self Service Portal
description:
Description
1. Epic Description
Epic (Requirement and Scope) 
Develop a comprehensive user manual for the M2M Self Service Portal to assist internal users from various departments, including sales, finance, marketing, and management, in navigating and utilizing the portal effectively.
The objective of this epic is to create a detailed user manual for the M2M Self Service Portal. This manual will serve as a guide for internal users from different departments (sales, finance, marketing, and management) . The manual will include step-by-step instructions, screenshots, FAQs, and troubleshooting tips to ensure users can efficiently use the portal for their respective needs.
To Do:
1. Planning:
•    Identify and gather all necessary information and resources.
•    Determine the structure and layout of the manual.
•    Assign team members to specific sections of the manual.
2. Content Creation:
•    Write detailed instructions and descriptions for each feature of the Self Service Portal.
•    Capture and include relevant screenshots and visuals.
•    Develop FAQs and troubleshooting guides.
3. Review and Revision:
•    Conduct a review cycle with representatives from sales, finance, marketing, and management.
•    Make necessary revisions based on feedback.
4. Finalization:
•    Format and proofread the manual.
•    Prepare digital PDF version.
5. Distribution:
•    Upload the digital manual to the SharePoint.
•    Distribute copies to each department.
Benefits:
Creating a user manual will improve efficiency and consistency by providing clear instructions and troubleshooting tips, reducing the time spent on support queries. It will enhance user satisfaction and autonomy, leading to increased productivity and fewer support requests.
  Specific Deliverables  
First version of User Manual for M2M Self Service Portal for internal users.
  Acceptance Criteria (conditions which must be satisfied for the Epic to be accepted)
All key functionalities of the Self Service Portal are covered in the User Manual.
Clear, concise language is used, and screenshots and visual aids are incorporated to enhance understanding, with a table of contents and an index included for easy navigation.
The manual is made available in digital (PDF) format, and it is accessible for users
The manual is reviewed for accuracy, and final approval is obtained from Product Owner and Product manager before distribution.
Out of Scope
Description of each possible reports in M2M Self Service Portal.. User Manual will introduce only basic information for existing attributes.
No changes in M2M Self Service Portal is required. 
Changes from current Q4 can't be included in first version of the User Manual.
Dependencies 
Reviewers availability for the feedback collection is required.
2. Technical / Solution Design / Compliance
Technical & Solution Design  
No changes is required.
Compliance evaluation
Done.
